title: Computer crash as soon as game loads.
body: I've experienced numerous crashes as soon as I load in a game. It occurs randomly. Sometimes my computer won't crash, other times my computer freezes and I'm forced to completely turn off my computer and turn it back on. If this occurs, it only does so during the first load into the game, otherwise it doesn't happen. This only happens with League. I'm up to a 20 minute queue wait due to the amount of times this has happened. Does anyone know a solution? My computer isn't terrible, it is capable of running League on it's highest settings and I get 100 fps doing so.

replies.body:
I suspect this may be related to a fairly common issue going around with the Windows Game Bar that was recently updated to provide *Game DVR*. This update was pushed out as part of the Windows 10 Anniversary update. I strongly recommend disabling this feature using [this guide.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if your issue persists.

I had something similar just occur myself, the game crashed 5 time and then when I closed League and restarted, it said I had corrupted files. I then got back in the game and we won. But I had to click "I agree" to not leave games for leave buster to let me play anymore.
